title: League of legends freezes for a while in loading screen then launches after
body:
When i play a normal game It when the champion select ends it just freezes and stays like that for a while then decides to launch and it really annoys me cos i join the actual game after 3 minutes + 
btw im on a mac, anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body:
Man, the my whole team was stuck in the chat after the game timer ended. So you mean every single player has to change their DNS?

Everyi was raging so funny. 

Stop blaming every single user bro. 

After I restarted the client, the game was not there anymore, so I guess we maged to not play the game.

The funny thing is "This all happened when I warned my team that I might disconnect" LOL. And they all got lagged out to.

But man, I do love League, but these servers issues giving us all a bad time you know :( . My holiday time too. Waitangi day, a long weekend.

I'm not blaming the user; I'm trying to help, and if a quick and efficient way of doing that is to check for certain configurations then I shall do that, saving time and getting people back into game ASAP.

I know that there are some server issues atm, and with certain cases, I explain this to the person seeking help. But this one looked like it could be solved. After all, not 100% people are lagging, just a very large number. Just because some people are lagging, it doesn't make sense for those who aren't to not be permitted to play.
